name: Voltar
description: Voltar is a classic oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With a sturdy box-like soldier body, Voltar's arms and legs are designed in a classic style, giving it a retro charm. Its vibrant red and black screen displays signals and data with precision and clarity. Voltar enhances its analytical capabilities with a pair of stylish glasses, allowing it to delve deeper into complex circuits and algorithms.
